title: Found a bug on Nami skin

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: > I found a bug on Deep Sea Nami skin

replies.body: The lantern of her head is not there
Oh i see it now you mean the light.

Hiya! 

Looks like Nami's lure is collapsing from trying to carry her ADC and they're a bit too heavy. ;)

Seriously, though! This a weighting issue that we're looking to have fixed for next patch.
